page.title: 16VILLAGE CHANGES SINCE 1900.
page.content: four per house,fourteen have three, twenty-one have two per home and five homes just one person living in them. {ADULTS ONLY}- 4homes-3adults,15homes- 3adults,76homes-2adults,8homes-1adult. {HOMES WITH PRIMARY AGED CHILDREN.} 3homes-3children,15homes-2children, 40homes-1child. {HOMES WITH CHILDREN UNDER SCHOOL AGE.} 13homes-2children, 18homes-1child. {HOMES WITH CHILDREN OF SECONDARY AGE.} 2homes-3children, 10homes-2children, 17homes-1child. {TOTAL NUMBER OF CHILDREN PER HOME. 2homes-5children,7homes-4children, 20homes-3children,26homes-2children, 11homes-1child,34homes-0children. THE "bulge" of children is of Primary age with a comparatively small number of children of under school age.
